message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a starting price of $11,500. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?

Bob, I understand your desire for a lower price, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is a fair compromise. This offer stands as a testament to my genuine interest in working with you.

Thank you for considering my request, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, I still feel there might be room for negotiation. Could we possibly agree on $10,500 for the product?
